title: 18. Socrates’ Methods and Effects
description: Socrates’ method of questioning, its aims, and its social and political consequences in Athens.

questions.question: In Plato’s Euthyphro, what definition of piety is first proposed?
options: What is loved by the gods

questions.question: Why does Socrates reject this definition of piety?
options: The gods disagree with one another

questions.question: What contradiction does Socrates expose in Euthyphro’s argument?

Something could be both pious and impious
Something could be both sacred and profane

questions.question: What conclusion is reached at the end of the discussion?
options: The definition of piety is insufficient
